_comment_settings: Settings used by the executable: lib path, log configuration

exeSettings._comment_useAudioVideo: True if this bot needs audio and/or video media. In this case ffmpegLibFolderPat property must be set too
exeSettings._comment_ffmpegLibFolderPath: If audio and/or video media are used, A valid path where FFMpeg libraries are stored according your system
exeSettings._comment_logFolderPath: Folder path where logs wile be stored
